thread.section_title: Auto Europe Australia Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Auto Europe Australia | autoeurope.com.au
thread.title: Stuart+Ratcliffe
thread.title_full: Auto Europe Australia reviewed by Stuart+Ratcliffe

author: Stuart+Ratcliffe
title: Stuart+Ratcliffe
text:
My wife and have used Auto Europe several times for our holidays in France, Italy and the UK. We have always found the booking system clear and simple to use, and the resulting quotations are always of excellent value.
In addition, the excess insurance cover provides peace of mind, and at a much more attractive rate than the rental companies themselves. On occasions we've contacted Auto Europe with queries, and they've always responded quickly and clearly.
